data.title: Curriculum but not Vitae
data.solution:
class String
  def alternating_cv?
    s = chomp.upcase.squeeze.chars.map { |c| 'AEIOU'[c] ? ?v : ?c }.join
    !(s['cc'] || s['vv'])
  end
end

gets
puts $<.select &:alternating_cv?
data.statement: Given a list of words, output only those consisting entirely of alternating consonants and vowels ({{A}}, {{E}}, {{I}}, {{O}}, and {{U}}), with <<runs of the same letter>> treated as a single unit.

data.stubGenerator:
read n:int
loop n read word:string(30)

write words
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1>>: [[N]], the number of words to filter
<<Next [[N]] lines:>> the words
data.outputDescription: the words that fit the criteria, in order of appearance

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Given a list of words, output only those consisting entirely of alternating consonants and vowels (A, E, I, O, and U), with runs of the same letter treated as a single unit.
Input
Line 1: N, the number of words to filter
Next N lines: the words
Output
the words that fit the criteria, in order of appearance
Constraints
Example
Input
2
curriculum
vitae
Output
curriculum
